mapper.select: SELECT P.MAINIMAGE,P.ID FROM PRODUCT_TB P JOIN TODAYITEMLIST_TB T ON P.ID = T.PRODUCT_ID WHERE T.ID BETWEEN (SELECT (LAST_NUMBER) -22 FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'TODAYITEMLIST_TB_SEQ') AND (SELECT (LAST_NUMBER) -12 FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'TODAYITEMLIST_TB_SEQ')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TODAYITEMLIST_TB(ID,PRODUCT_ID) SELECT TODAYITEMLIST_TB_SEQ.NEXTVAL,ID FROM(SELECT ID FROM PRODUCT_TB ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM <= 9
mapper.select: SELECT TITLE,ID,MAINIMAGE FROM (SELECT * FROM PRODUCT_TB ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM <= 15
